لحظات تاريخيّة. القدس تقاوم، وتوقظ بالكرامة والبهاء كل فلسطين ليلتئم الوطن المجزأ ويتمرّد على نكبته، على تقسيمه. في اللد وغزّة وبيت لحم وحيفا والناصرة؛ وطن يتحرّر بوحدة نضاله. هذه اللحظة لنا كلنا، نحن أهل فلسطين، من يعيش فيها ومن نُفي منها لاجئًا.

🚨 Gaza Ministry of Health: number of Palestinians killed now up to 20, including nine children. 65 others others wounded.

9 children killed two days before Eid.

tweets.text:
Israeli planes have bombed Gaza, killing civilians in the street including 4 children. The videos & photographs are too horrific to share.
The names of the four boys killed:
 Ahmed Ibrahim Abdullah Al-Masry
 Ibrahim Youssef Al-Masry
 Muhammad Ali Naseer
 Mohammed Abdullah Fayyad
Happening now in Al Aqsa. Tear gas being sprayed choking Palestinians. https://t.co/guzz5zkZRr
"If you are in South Africa and you want to help Palestinians, help by refusing to remain in normal relations with Israel until it stop its occupation." @MariamBarghouti https://t.co/RA4QiprMoT

urls.title: Why American politicians cannot say the words ‘Israeli apartheid’
urls.description: American political language does not have the capacity to address Palestine because it is disabled by white supremacy.

tweets.text: "The US is very much like Israel: in both countries, your rights and opportunities are inescapably decided by your racial or ethnic background." — writes @MariamBarghouti for #AJOpinion https://t.co/628K7OAFWo

urls.title: ‘We put our souls into this land’: Palestinians mourn land lost to settler arson attack – Mondoweiss
urls.description: Palestinians from the village of Burin were forced to watch as the night sky lit up their village with orange flames and clouds of smoke. By the time the settlers and soldiers retreated, the damage had already been done.

tweets.text: Palestinians from the village of Burin were forced to watch as the night sky lit up their village with orange flames and clouds of smoke. By the time the settlers and soldiers retreated, the damage had already been done https://t.co/9FJfkFDnl0 via @Mondoweiss

🚨 Don’t donate to any #SheikhJarrah funds that weren’t endorsed by us. We are committed to keeping the fight for Sheikh Jarrah a political one—to save our homes from displacement & stop Israeli authorities from colonial expansion. It is not time for humanitarian support yet.

الناشطون الفلسطينيون يطلبون عدم استخدام شعار Palestinian lives matter
 
١- يفتقر إلى السياق المناسب وخصوصية القضية المتعلقة بأرض لا أقلية كما BLM.
٢- تحوير شعار BLM يضر الحركة واستمرارية لخطف التركيز على معاناة السود مثل All Lives Matter
#انقذوا_حي_الشيخ_الجراح
#SaveSheikhJarrah
Let Palestinians speak for Palestinians

Let the scenes from Jerusalem break your heart. Let them enrage you. And the next time someone tries to gaslight you into confusion and stop you from speaking out for Palestinian freedom, remember what you have seen. Remember what is at stake if you remain silent.

Israeli forces have gone mad in Sheikh Jarrah, beating everyone in sight, demolishing the solidarity tents, using excessive force... Impunity breeds fascism. 

the Occupation knows it will not be held accountable by a complicit international community. #SaveSheikhJarrah https://t.co/QlVkHCSegr

المستوطنين هاجمين على سيارة شاب في شارع رقم ١، مكسرين الشاب وسيارته بحجار. الشاب كان عم بنزف والشرطة كانت تتفرج، لمرق صديق النا وطلب الإسعاف. 
المهم، إنتبهوا وكونوا مع بعض بجماعات وإحكوا لأصحابكو ينتبهوا. #انقذوا_حي_الشيخ_الجراح #القدس_تنتفض

فلسطين كل يوم تجسد كلمات الأغنية

"طالعلك يا عدوي طالع، من كل بيت، حارة وشارع"

Settlers and the Israeli army are on a violent rampage during Ramadan, trying to steal the homes of Palestinian families in the #SheikhJarrah neighborhood of East Jerusalem.  Disgusting and typical.  

Follow @MariamBarghouti, who is there and documenting.
Absolutely horrendous scenes from inside Al-Aqsa Mosque compound where Israeli forces attacked peaceful worshippers holding night prayers https://t.co/t70eALNaCc

📢Want to learn more about what's happening in Sheikh Jarrah and Jerusalem?

Join my Twitter Spaces room tomorrow (Sunday) at 4pm UK/6pm Palestine time, to hear from @alhaq_org's @AseelAlBajeh & J'lem-based writer @JalalAK_jojo, who have kindly agreed to share their insights.

urls.title: Violence in Jerusalem - United States Department of State
urls.description: The United States is extremely concerned about ongoing confrontations in Jerusalem, including on the Haram al-Sharif / Temple Mount and in Sheikh Jarrah, which have reportedly resulted in scores of injured people. There is no excuse for violence, but such bloodshed is especially disturbing now, coming as it does on the last days of Ramadan. […]

tweets.text: We are extremely concerned about ongoing confrontations in Jerusalem, including on the Haram al-Sharif/Temple Mount and in Sheikh Jarrah. We call on Israeli and Palestinian officials to act decisively to deescalate tensions & bring a halt to the violence. https://t.co/WV5adgCfmS

سألت أحد العاملين في الإسعاف ونقل المصابين البارحة في الأقصى عن ليلته، فقال: ليلة دامية، الإصابات في الوجه، في الصدر، وعدد منها في الرأس مباشرة، قلة قليلة نقلناهم راجلين إلى المستشفيات. يذكر أن الهلال الأحمر اضطر لفتح مستشقى ميداني للتعامل مع حجم الإصابات البارحة.،

tweets.text: More footage showing clashes in Jerusalem’s Old City where both Palestinians and Israel Police officers have been injured

I understand why for many Jews, the charge that Zionism is settler colonialism is deeply uncomfortable, because it seems to deny the historical Jewish connection to the land. But this is not about the ancient past. It's about the present. The unrelenting logic of settlement.

How many times should a Palestinian be assaulted, have his bones broken? How many times must we be arrested? Displaced? 

Saleh Diab getting arrested. https://t.co/p6RT9LO6h3

مكاتب السفارات، والمؤسسات الدولية وموظفيها، الي بفصلها شارع حرفيا عن العائلات المهددة بالإخلاء مش ناسيينكم. العنف الي عم بتمارسوا ضدنا من كثير سنين، من خلال تقاريركم، خطابكم وأهم إشي سياسات التمويل الي بتفرضوها علينا، كمان رح تتحاسبوا عليه.
